osvSchema.details: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in 0ch BBS Script ver.4.00. An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using 0ch BBS Script ver.4.00.

description_data.value: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in 0ch BBS Script ver.4.00. An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using 0ch BBS Script ver.4.00.

descriptions.value: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in 0ch BBS Script ver.4.00. An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using 0ch BBS Script ver.4.00.

Existe una vulnerabilidad de Cross-site scripting en 0ch BBS Script versión 4.00. Se puede ejecutar un script arbitrario en el navegador web del usuario que accede al sitio web que utiliza el producto. Tenga en cuenta que no se pudo localizar al desarrollador, por lo tanto, los usuarios deberían considerar dejar de usar 0ch BBS Script versión 4.00.
